**ATL Booking Information and Requirements** ğŸ¯

__Booking Process__ ğŸ“…

â€¢ **All bookings must be made through a faculty advisor**
â€¢ **Reservations require 7-30 days advance notice**
â€¢ **Confirmation will be provided within 7 days of request**

Booking is easy! Just ask your faculty advisor to help you reserve a space.

**Summary** ğŸ“: The booking process involves several steps and requirements to ensure smooth facility access! ğŸ“…âœ…

__Booking Requirements__ ğŸ“…

â€¢ **Minimum charge**: 4 hours per room
â€¢ **Fractions of an hour are treated as full hours**
â€¢ **Faculty advisor must submit the booking request**
â€¢ **Users must be eligible (students with faculty supervision, etc.)**

These requirements help us keep the lab running smoothly for everyone!

**Summary** ğŸ“: The booking process involves several steps and requirements to ensure smooth facility access! ğŸ“…âœ…

__User Responsibilities__ ğŸ¤

â€¢ **Be mindful while using rooms and equipment**
â€¢ **Responsible for any damage to facility property**
â€¢ **Switch off all electronic systems at the end of booking**
â€¢ **Keep the place clean and tidy**
â€¢ **Responsible for any irremovable marks**

We appreciate your help in keeping ATL a great place for everyone!

**Summary** ğŸ“: These guidelines help ensure everyone has a positive experience and facilities remain in good condition! ğŸ¤ğŸŒŸ

__XR Space__ ğŸ“Œ

**Basic Information** â„¹ï¸
  â€¢ Area: 71.3 square meters
  â€¢ Capacity: 50 people

**Key Features** âœ¨
  â€¢ Explore the cross-border exchange between art and technology
  â€¢ XR Virtual Simulation System


Let me know if you want to book XR Space or need more details!

**Summary** ğŸ“: This section provides important information about XR Space! ğŸ“ŒğŸ’¡

__Pricing Categories__ ğŸ’°

**Pricing** ğŸ’°
  â€¢ External Organizations: Highest rates
  â€¢ Non-UGC Non-Arts Programs: High rates
  â€¢ UGC Non-Arts Programs: Medium rates
  â€¢ Non-UGC Arts Programs: Lower rates
  â€¢ UGC Arts Programs: Fees waived


We offer different rates for different user types!

**Summary** ğŸ“: Pricing varies based on user category, with different rates for different types of users! ğŸ’°ğŸ“Š

â€¢ **Location**: Run Run Shaw Tower (RRST-4.35), Centennial Campus

Reach out if you need help with booking or have any questions!

**XR Space - Facility Details** ğŸ¯

__XR Space - Complete Information__ ğŸ“Œ

**Basic Information** â„¹ï¸
  â€¢ Area: 71.3 square meters
  â€¢ Capacity: 50 people

**Key Features** âœ¨
  â€¢ Explore the cross-border exchange between art and technology
  â€¢ XR Virtual Simulation System
  â€¢ Projection mapping technology
  â€¢ Innovative immersive experience and collaboration platform

**Hardware** ğŸ’»
  â€¢ Nvidia RTX 4090 GPU workstation
  â€¢ 6 NEC NP-PE456USL projectors
  â€¢ Vaddio RoboTRAK Tracking System
  â€¢ 2 workstations with the following configurations: CPU: i7-14700K TRAY, RAM: GSKILL TRIDENT Z5 NEO RGB 32GB X2 J32, GPU: MSI 4080 SUPER VENUS 3X OC 16G

**Software** ğŸ–¥ï¸
  â€¢ Unreal Engine
  â€¢ Unity
  â€¢ Touchdesigner

__Pricing & Fees__ ğŸ’°

**Pricing** ğŸ’°
  â€¢ External Organizations: 1000 Hong Kong dollars/hour
  â€¢ Non-UGC Non-Arts: 800 Hong Kong dollars/hour
  â€¢ UGC Non-Arts: 600 Hong Kong dollars/hour
  â€¢ Non-UGC Arts: 450 Hong Kong dollars/hour
  â€¢ UGC Arts: Waived


Rates vary by user category. Contact ATL for booking and payment procedures.

**Summary** ğŸ“: Pricing varies based on user category, with different rates for different types of users! ğŸ’°ğŸ“Š

__Booking Process__ ğŸ“…

â€¢ **All bookings must be made through a faculty advisor**

â€¢ **Confirmation will be provided within 7 days of request**

Booking is easy! Just ask your faculty advisor to help you reserve a space.

**Summary** ğŸ“: The booking process involves several steps and requirements to ensure smooth facility access! ğŸ“…âœ…

__Booking Requirements__ ğŸ“…

â€¢ **Minimum charge**: 4 hours per room
â€¢ **Fractions of an hour are treated as full hours**
â€¢ **Faculty advisor must submit the booking request**
â€¢ **Users must be eligible (students with faculty supervision, etc.)**

These requirements help us keep the lab running smoothly for everyone!

**Summary** ğŸ“: The booking process involves several steps and requirements to ensure smooth facility access! ğŸ“…âœ…

â€¢ **Be mindful while using rooms and equipment**
â€¢ **Responsible for any damage to facility property**

â€¢ **Keep the place clean and tidy**
â€¢ **Responsible for any irremovable marks**

We appreciate your help in keeping ATL a great place for everyone!
